attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Homework is inconvienient to everyone. The pupils don't like doing it when they are at home, and the teachers don't like marking it out of school hours. Children need time away from the pressure of education, and not have to do work that the teachers haven't covered in lesson outside of school. After all, shouldn't school be for for learning and home be for relaxing after school?
